name: Crafted_Shield_Breaker_D
display_help: Enhances the defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.
